editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-14r: Prayer of the Covenant, Ṣälotä Kidan, ጸሎተ፡ ኪዳን፡. F-25v: Mystagogia, ትምህርተ፡ ኅቡዓት፡. HTexte 48–72; Textes 40–52; Me‘erāf I 215–7; MG 9ff. F-33r: God of the luminaries, Ǝgzi’abḥer zä-bǝrhanat. እግዚአብሔር፡ ዘብርሃናት፡. Répertoire 363; EMML 4001 (10: 1); and Princeton Ethiopic 13, f–46r. See also EA 2: 249; and Säbattu Kidanat, Qǝddase Maryam, Mälkǝ’a Guba’e (Addis Ababa: Täsfa, 1959 E.C.). F-39v: Prayer, “For the sake of peaceful holy things,”Bä’ǝntä Qǝdsat, በእንተ፡ ቅድሳት፡ ሰላማዊት፡. MQ 26 –9; MG 41ff.; Liturgy 33 –7; EMIP 37, f –113r. F-41r: Excerpt from the Anaphora of Our Lord, Qǝddase Ǝgzi’, ቅዳሴ፡ እግዚእ፡. EMIP 27. See Mercer and HSEA. F-52r: Excerpt from the Anaphora, Prayer to God, "We Praise You," ነአኵተከ አምላክ ቅዱስ. F: Excerpt from the Anaphora, "Holy, Holy, Holy Trinity." -138v: Prayer For the Remission of Sin of the Twelve Apostles, ጸሎተ ሥርየተ ኃጢአት ዘ፲ወ፪ አርድዕት, arranged for the days of the week: Monday (53r), Tuesday (72r), Wednesday (98r), Thursday (111r), Friday (119v), Saturday (124v), Sunday (133r). F and passim mention the owner, ወልደ መድኀን. : Concluding note of ownership: This book is the property of Dabtara አመራ ሳለሁ. "Since I am alive, this book is mine; after my departure it is willed to Leramha George Church." , columns 1 and 2: Pledge to give 40 birr now and at any point in the future when they have a son, they will give 300 birr.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
